tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE dispute_resolution_cases (
    case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    case_description TEXT,
    dispute_type VARCHAR(50),
    resolution_date DATE,
    outcome VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE CaseOutcomes ( 
 outcome_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
 case_id INT, 
 outcome_description TEXT, 
 outcome_date DATE, 
 FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES DisputeCases(case_id) 
 );

CREATE TABLE CaseParticipants ( 
 participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
 case_id INT, 
 participant_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, 
 participant_role VARCHAR(50), 
 FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES DisputeCases(case_id) 
 );

CREATE TABLE case_comments (
  comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  case_id INT REFERENCES dispute_cases(case_id),
  comment_text TEXT,
  commenter_name VARCHAR(255),
  comment_date DATE
);
